SELECT dt.id, dt.`name`, dt.sex, dt.birthday, dt.cellphone, GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT_WS('-',dtf.factor_code,dtf.factor_type,dtf.factor_level)) as factors FROM diagnose_target AS dt LEFT JOIN diagnose_target_factor AS dtf ON dt.id = dtf.target_id where 1 =1
AND dt.name LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{query.name} ,'%')
AND dt.id = #{query.targetId}
AND IF( #{query.factorType} =1 OR #{query.factorType} = 2 , dtf.factor_code = #{query.factorCode} AND dtf.factor_type = #{query.factorType},dtf.factor_code = #{query.factorCode} AND dtf.factor_level >= ifnull(#{query.factorLevel},0) AND dtf.factor_type = #{query.factorType} )
GROUP BY dt.id ORDER BY dt.update_time DESC
